description: Apple AirPlay 2 is coming to Samsung, Sony, LG, and Vizio TVs. Its a remarkable and surprising collaboration between competitors, and its not usually how the industry works. Apple didnt give a keynote speech and didnt have a booth on the show floor, but nevertheless dominates the show year after year. Dieter Bohn explains why the biggest surprise from CES 2019 came from Apple.
